title: Chocolate marshmallow teacakes
description: Paul Hollywood's step-by-step recipe for chocolate marshmallow teacakes will certainly make an impression.Equipment and preparation: You will need a silicone mould that has 6 x 7.5cm/3in wide, half sphere moulds.
ingredients: 400g/14oz dark chocolate with around 40% cocoa solids (such as Bournville)
